name: Claude
description: Anthropic Claude 风格，温暖渐变色主题

styles.container: max-width: 700px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px 24px 56px 24px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.7 !important; color: #2b2b2b !important; background-color: #faf9f7 !important; word-wrap: break-word; letter-spacing: -0.01em;

h1.base: font-size: 48px; font-weight: 600; color: #C15F3C !important; line-height: 1.15 !important; margin: 64px 0 32px; letter-spacing: -0.025em;

h2.base: font-size: 36px; font-weight: 600; color: #C15F3C !important; line-height: 1.25 !important; margin: 56px 0 28px; letter-spacing: -0.02em;

h3.base: font-size: 28px; font-weight: 600; color: #2b2b2b !important; line-height: 1.3 !important; margin: 48px 0 24px; letter-spacing: -0.015em;

base.base: font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color: #3a3a3a !important; line-height: 1.4 !important; margin: 40px 0 20px; letter-spacing: -0.01em;

list.taskList: margin: 16px 0; line-height: 1.75 !important; color: #2b2b2b !important; font-size: 18px; list-style: none;

code.block: margin: 40px 0; padding: 28px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2b2b2b 0%, #3a3a3a 100%); color: #f5f5f5 !important; border-radius: 12px; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 1.6 !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.15);
code.inline: font-family: "SF Mono", Consolas, Monaco, monospace; font-size: 16px; padding: 3px 8px; background-color: rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.08) !important; color: #C15F3C !important; border-radius: 8px; font-weight: 500; border: 1px solid rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.15);

styles.quote: margin: 32px 0; padding: 16px 24px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.06) 0%, rgba(157, 200, 141, 0.06) 100%); border-left: 4px solid #C15F3C; color: #2b2b2b !important; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.55 !important; font-style: italic; border-radius: 8px;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 600px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 48px auto; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.12);
styles.link: color: #C15F3C !important; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.4); font-weight: 500;

emphasis.strong: font-weight: 600; color: #C15F3C !important; background-color: rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.08) !important; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 3px;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 40px 0; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 17px; border-radius: 8px; overflow: hidden;
table.header: background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.08) 0%, rgba(157, 200, 141, 0.08) 100%); padding: 16px 20px; text-align: left; border: none; font-weight: 600; color: #2b2b2b !important; border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.2);
table.cell: padding: 16px 20px; border: none; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.1); color: #2b2b2b !important;

styles.hr: margin: 64px auto; border: none; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, rgba(193, 95, 60, 0.3), rgba(157, 200, 141, 0.3), transparent); max-width: 240px;
